title.narrative: Provide remote and field IM support - 2022
IMSMA Core implemented and deployed in 2 countries

comment.narrative: No work done in Q1 of 2022. The situation in Afghanistan remains an issue.

title.narrative: IMSMA Core implemented and deployed in 2 countries

Number of countries/programmes are using IMSMA Core to collect, analyse and disseminate data and CORE deployed / Number of countries/programmes addressing and identified recommendations throughout IM capacity development framework

comment.narrative: Libya: It was planned to conduct an IM workshop to follow with IMSMA Core implementation in person in Libya. Unfortunately, the COVID-19 restrictions did not allow the workshop to take the place. However, the IM technical support is delivered based on the work plan, the focus of IM advisory support in Q4 was on improving the Polygon/Point collection for land release polygons and developing a workflow for task orders framework in order to enable LiBMAC with tasking mechanism.

The IM technical support started in Q2, after identifying the workplan in agreement with both NMAA, the main provided IM support for Libya were it was Installation brand-new Postgres, developing DE informs, in the Q3 we provided IM support to NMAC to test and pilot the data entry forms via share it with implementing partners to use in the field, and after several meeting with LiBMAC it was decided to conduct an IM workshop in Libya in person by Q4, but we still monitor the situation to follow with COVID rules and restriction.

The IM technical support started in Q2, after identifying the workplan in agreement with both NMAA, the main provided IM support for Libya were; 1. Installed a brand-new Postgres 11 to be the IMSMA Core database. 2. Regarding forms, for the 4 existing forms in the Portal (Accident-Victim, EOD, Land and Education), the support was: - Created new forms (the names start with LibMAC) - Reviewed all the fields and adapted them if necessary (to take into account the migration) - Standardized the 4 forms so that the field names are consistent between forms And the main provided IM support for Afghanistan was preparing the workplan and address the needs along with MARS support for the remote data entry.
